businessProfile.name: The Place Pizza
businessProfile.address: 1032 N Redwood Rd Ste C, Saratoga Springs, UT 84045, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 1032 N Redwood Rd Ste C, Saratoga Springs, UT 84045, USA

reviews.text:
Was rather disappointed.

I got a gluten free pizza and the crust was not great. It was not fully cooked and seemed like I was eating bird seed.

The toppings helped mask it slightly. I got the chicken, bacon, ranch pizza.

The regular pizza I am assuming is a lot better but they really need to improve on their gluten free crust!! Maybe their cauliflower one is better.

The gluten free pizza also takes so much longer (which I get) but maybe also inform customers of that. I had almost all 5-6 people after me get their pizza before mine even came out.

Stopped by this Italian pizza place on a whim, and I‚Äôm so glad I did! The pizza was absolutely delicious authentic crust, fresh ingredients, and just the right balance of flavors. You can tell they take pride in what they serve.

What really stood out was the staff. Everyone was incredibly friendly and welcoming. From the moment I walked in, they made me feel like a regular. Great service, fast turnaround, and they even checked in to make sure everything was perfect.

We ordered the ‚ÄúDefinitely Authentic‚Äù Italiano with a balsamic glaze and pesto swirl. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for great pizza and genuinely kind people. Will definitely be coming back!

Came here for my husband's birthday. The Place has got some good rock music with good vibes. The table design with the pizza carving is so cute. The staff is super friendly and helped us make our pizza choices. It was right to listen to them.

The chicken bacon ranch and "definitely authentic" Italiano are outstanding. The bacon, chicken, tomato pieces are thick cut. They don't skip out on the ingredients, sauce, and the quality/freshness of it. They even have some homemade BBQ and jalapeno cilantro they can give on the side. We both really liked the Italiano pizza considering the flavor and the amount of arugula they put on because we asked!

We're so glad we came! This local Place Pizza has got some good wood fire pizzas without miles to travel to. Comparable to some wood fire pizza places in SLC. These pizzas are fired perfectly. The crusts aren't burnt like some other places do. They are not as greasy or heavy either.

Great first time experience. It isn't busy here at 5.30pm on a Saturday but 6pm it starts to fill up. And from observation they are so good at updating diners/takeout orders on the waiting time.

Really great pizza. Nice to see a wood fired pizza place. Cool flavors, very nice people.

Dessert "pizzas" were fantastic.

They do need to organize the drink area and put in an ice machine, though.

Authentic freshly made wood fired pizza cooked with local cherry wood at a reasonable price. This place was absolutely delicious and among the very best wood fired pizza I've ever had. The ovens are custom made. What a gem in Saratoga Springs.

recentReviews.text: Great dough! Makes the pizza. Love the chicken Alfredo.
Took my family here for lunch, pizza was fabulous, service & price was perfect . I fed 4 adults & 4 teenager s for 51.00 The place is AMAZING
The pizza was so good! I got half ultimate Hawaiian and green chicken and it was soooo good! The crust is 10/10 and the service was exceptional. Will definitely be back!
The pizza was so good and so cheap! Everyone working here was so kind and gave recommendations! We will definitely be back! ü©∑
So great!! Gean was so helpful and had very good recommendations! Would recommend Ÿ©(^‚Äø^)€∂

We came in really excited to try this place, but unfortunately it was a big disappointment. The pizza was a bit overpriced and took about 40 minutes to come out, even though it wasn‚Äôt busy. When it finally arrived, it was burnt and hard, looked unappetizing, and tasted like cardboard. Definitely not worth it. The only positive was that the employees were kind, but I won‚Äôt be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Bryce Allen
detailedReviews.text: Very good. Yum!üòã

detailedReviews.author: Emily Allen
detailedReviews.text: Great dough! Makes the pizza. Love the chicken Alfredo.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Jenkins
detailedReviews.text: Took my family here for lunch, pizza was fabulous, service & price was perfect . I fed 4 adults & 4 teenager s for 51.00 The place is AMAZING

detailedReviews.author: Justina Alatini
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was so good! I got half ultimate Hawaiian and green chicken and it was soooo good! The crust is 10/10 and the service was exceptional. Will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Emily Afemata
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was so good and so cheap! Everyone working here was so kind and gave recommendations! We will definitely be back! ü©∑

detailedReviews.author: Elaine Akester
detailedReviews.text: So great!! Gean was so helpful and had very good recommendations! Would recommend Ÿ©(^‚Äø^)€∂

detailedReviews.author: Teresa Barrett
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in town!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Isaac M
detailedReviews.text: Waited 30 min for burnt pizza

detailedReviews.author: Katelyn Hemingway
detailedReviews.text: We came in really excited to try this place, but unfortunately it was a big disappointment. The pizza was a bit overpriced and took about 40 minutes to come out, even though it wasn‚Äôt busy. When it finally arrived, it was burnt and hard, looked unappetizing, and tasted like cardboard. Definitely not worth it. The only positive was that the employees were kind, but I won‚Äôt be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Bobbie Delk
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!! Fresh and hot!!

detailedReviews.author: Dustin Snooks
detailedReviews.text: Really good atmosphere. Love the place

detailedReviews.author: Nicholas Ludwig
detailedReviews.text: My new favorite pizza spot. Best wood fired cheese pizza around!

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Rusher
detailedReviews.text:
I'm pretty picky when it comes to pizza, but this place is my favorite pizza place ever. The service of the staff has always been great, and the margherita pizza is probably my go-to because it never misses.
10/10, highly recommend this place!

detailedReviews.author: Sean McDonald
detailedReviews.text: There was a problem with DoorDash, and Jean went out of his way to fix the situation. And the pizza was great! Way better than domino's!

detailedReviews.author: Collin Parrish
detailedReviews.text:
We really like this place.   Probably been there around five times or so.   A single 12" will usually be enough for a date night.   Today we couldn't decide between the blackberry or the peach pizza so we got one with half of each which was excellent.
One time we went it was a little crowded but we've tried to go at non-peak times and have had a great experience each time.   Super nice people and the crust is pillowy where it needs to be and chewy where it needs to be.   They don't skimp on toppings and ingredients appear to be high quality.

detailedReviews.author: Conner Mickelsen
detailedReviews.text: Would recommend thinking twice about catering with them.  They were an hour late to our wedding luncheon and this made it so we couldn‚Äôt do some of the activities as planned.  When we confronted them about it they said on the invoice it showed they were supposed to be there at 5:00 when we needed them there at 4:00.  Looked at the invoice and it showed 4:00.  They let us come in before hand and taste the pizza and showed us pictures of their setup.  The pizza was really good and the setup potential was promising.  Then at our venue the pizza was mid at best and really flimsy.  Then the setup was not what we were promised and looked really rushed.  Not impressed.

detailedReviews.author: J T
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve been there a couple times and the pizza is great, but it feels like I‚Äôm in a college dorm that happens to have 2 nice pizza ovens in it. Atmosphere is EXREMELY cluttered and not enticing. Whenever we go to dine in, it‚Äôs crowded and the seating isn‚Äôt great. We are lucky if we find a spot to sit with our family. Last time there was an extra fold up table that my kids could move which isn‚Äôt fun for anyone who has kids. It‚Äôs also VERY hot inside during the summer due to the heat of the sun combined with the open pizza ovens. Again, pizza is great, but not a fun place to dine in. A nice re-design/remodel and extra AC would really make this place ‚ÄúThe Place‚Äù

detailedReviews.author: Julie Harris
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a margherita and pepperoni on Uber Eats, so I can‚Äôt speak to the experience at the restaurant, but the pizza was PHENOMENAL! Incredible crust and a fantastic Neapolitan pizza in Utah County (very hard to come by!)

detailedReviews.author: Chuck Hale
detailedReviews.text: Great family run pizza restaurant. Wonderful food, unique offerings, great people, authentic brick oven.

detailedReviews.author: estefani leidiana villanueva esparragoza
detailedReviews.text: Muy buenas

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Garc√≠a
detailedReviews.text: Muy buenas las pizzas a le√±a ü§§ü§§ Recomendado üëå

detailedReviews.author: P V
detailedReviews.text: This place is definitely the Pizza Place! The sourdough is perfectly fermented, and the fresh ingredients speak for themselves. I've ordered three times as of today üòÜ, and even when I made mistakes with my online order, they were quick to correct them. My kids wouldn‚Äôt eat the first order becauseit had hot peppers, but they kindly gave us a free pizza when I had to reorder again üò± in one day. Thank you for caring about your customers and making sure we keep coming back for the good stuff in Saratoga Springs!

detailedReviews.author: Denys Fedotov
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food. Peach pizza (chef special) was amazing. Garlic crust too.

detailedReviews.author: Karla Venegas
detailedReviews.text: Las mejores pizzas

detailedReviews.author: david anderson
detailedReviews.text:
Awesome pizza place!! Jean did a wonderful job!!

The Brother‚Äôs have an amazing Pizza Place!

detailedReviews.author: bing yeung
detailedReviews.text:
Came here for my husband's birthday. The Place has got some good rock music with good vibes. The table design with the pizza carving is so cute. The staff is super friendly and helped us make our pizza choices. It was right to listen to them.

The chicken bacon ranch and "definitely authentic" Italiano are outstanding. The bacon, chicken, tomato pieces are thick cut. They don't skip out on the ingredients, sauce, and the quality/freshness of it. They even have some homemade BBQ and jalapeno cilantro they can give on the side. We both really liked the Italiano pizza considering the flavor and the amount of arugula they put on because we asked!

We're so glad we came! This local Place Pizza has got some good wood fire pizzas without miles to travel to. Comparable to some wood fire pizza places in SLC. These pizzas are fired perfectly. The crusts aren't burnt like some other places do. They are not as greasy or heavy either.

Great first time experience. It isn't busy here at 5.30pm on a Saturday but 6pm it starts to fill up. And from observation they are so good at updating diners/takeout orders on the waiting time.

detailedReviews.author: Cameron Hicken
detailedReviews.text: I 100% recommend eating here if you are out for pizza. Amazing food, amazing service! The employee that made our pizza, Jean, was amazing! Thank you!

detailedReviews.author: benson miller
detailedReviews.text: It was sooooooo good. Actually the best PIZZA ever!!!

detailedReviews.author: Eli Martinez
detailedReviews.text: So good, Jean is the absolute legend

detailedReviews.author: Allison Provenza
detailedReviews.text: Super nice staff, the pizza is awesome. It's one of the very few places in saratoga that is not a stupid chain. The different types of pizza are great and the crust and woodfire taste is phenomenal.

detailedReviews.author: Arthur Melazzo
detailedReviews.text: Service was amazing and food tasted like Authentic Italian pizza. So good, definitely recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Madrona
detailedReviews.text: Everything was Just wow ü§Ø

detailedReviews.author: Audrey Acomb
detailedReviews.text: Probably the best specialty pizzas I've ever had. Raspberry breadstick is worth every penny. Their pepperoni pizza wasn't my favorite, but the Chicken Parm was great and the blackberry pizza was SO good.

detailedReviews.author: Julie Acomb
detailedReviews.text: This place was so yummy! Delicious brick oven style pizza with unique combinations. We had a Bumble BBB with blackberries fontina basil and balsamic drizzle. Amazing.  We also had a pepperoni, and a chicky chicky parm parm. So unique and flavorful. The dessert was a raspberry cream breadstick which was over-the-top delicious. Would highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Saldias
detailedReviews.text: Everyone that works here is so kind, pizza is amazing. My favorite is the ultimate Hawaiian. Highly recommend and my family will definitely be going back.

detailedReviews.author: cortny barton
detailedReviews.text: This pizza is soooo good! The GM told us about their special fiesta sauce and it‚Äôs to die for. He also suggested we do a half and half pizza which allowed us to try multiple different flavors. It‚Äôs amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Roberts
detailedReviews.text:
One of the best pizza spots in the state. The wood fire ovens are fun to watch while you wait. They crank out pizza. We went during the Friday dinner rush and waited for about 40 min, but it was well worth the wait. Next time I will order ahead.

The stuffed cheese bread is awesome.

detailedReviews.author: Lena Robinson
detailedReviews.text: This place is AMAZING!!! We tried the peach cinnamon breadsticks and they were to die for omg. And then we got their blackberry pizza and peach pizza and I was skeptical of it but the flavors are unreal and work surprisingly well together. Please keep the blackberry pizza on the menu I‚Äôm already dreaming about having it again!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Mansfield
detailedReviews.text: We love coming to the Place Pizza, this is easily our favorite pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Siena Jensen
detailedReviews.text:
Stopped by this Italian pizza place on a whim, and I‚Äôm so glad I did! The pizza was absolutely delicious authentic crust, fresh ingredients, and just the right balance of flavors. You can tell they take pride in what they serve.

What really stood out was the staff. Everyone was incredibly friendly and welcoming. From the moment I walked in, they made me feel like a regular. Great service, fast turnaround, and they even checked in to make sure everything was perfect.

We ordered the ‚ÄúDefinitely Authentic‚Äù Italiano with a balsamic glaze and pesto swirl. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for great pizza and genuinely kind people. Will definitely be coming back!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Barone
detailedReviews.text: Thank you very much for everything! The service is great and the pizzas super delicious. I loved the food! üòç

detailedReviews.author: Nazaret Rojas
detailedReviews.text: Excelente servicio! Excelente atenci√≥n la pizza deliciosa y jugosa recomendada al 10000%

detailedReviews.author: Diego Rojad
detailedReviews.text: Muy buena atenci√≥n, la comida es muy deliciosa ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Veronica Macias Santos
detailedReviews.text:
We couldn‚Äôt decide between the Margherita or the Chicken Alfredo so we got the larger size to get half and half. Wow.
So delicious. Fresh basil. Fresh veggies.

Dessert pizza was also superb.

And leftovers for another day.

Yummm.

detailedReviews.author: Carolyn Rideout
detailedReviews.text: This is by far the best pizza in Saratoga Springs. I get the vegan and my husband gets supreme.

detailedReviews.author: Emily V
detailedReviews.text: We came here randomly once last year and can't stop. It's become one of our favorite local pizza places, every kind we have tried has been amazing! We are huge fans!

detailedReviews.author: Sam Scholes
detailedReviews.text: Really fresh and quality ingredients! I wish I got the name of the guy that helped us because he was so kind and friendly. Definitely will be back

detailedReviews.author: Chris Baugh
detailedReviews.text: Friendly staff (Gene), and seriously delicious calzones and pizza.

detailedReviews.author: April H
detailedReviews.text: Deluxe toppings and great crust with quick service, we will definitely be going back!

detailedReviews.author: Tristan Wayman
detailedReviews.text: Went in late Sunday when it was closed and Jean made us an awesome pizza he was a super cool guy.

detailedReviews.author: Mark
detailedReviews.text: It was Sunday and the place was closed they had just closed and Gene decided to stay a couple more minutes just to make me a pizza what's the best pizza I ever ate in my life I can tell you that and I'll pass it on to everybody thank you Jean

detailedReviews.author: Abigail
detailedReviews.text: El se√±or Jean Carlos es s√∫per atento, Muy buen ambiente de trabajo muchas gracias a Todos S√∫per Recomiendo 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Hannah Courchene
detailedReviews.text: So good!! Their pizzas are delicious & have tasty sourdough crust! Doesn't upset my stomach like most pizzas do. Make sure to try their ranch!! I love their Alfredo pizza & classic pepperoni.

detailedReviews.author: Miles Dunn
detailedReviews.text: The wood-fired pizza is the star of the show. The dough is great, the pizza combinations are interesting and different, and its owner operated by a couple of friends.

detailedReviews.author: Jairo Zambrano
detailedReviews.text: I love the pizza here, and the service is super friendly. The pizza tastes amazing, the flour is perfect, and I love the oven they make it in. And Jean Cheung's service is the best.

detailedReviews.author: andrea garcia
detailedReviews.text: One of the only pizzas i‚Äôll enjoy!! It‚Äôs within walking distance from my job so i come here all the time and every time, it‚Äôs never disappointed. The pizza is always hot and fresh and always flavorful. I absolutely love the chicken bacon ranch. the employees are always so kind and willing to listen to any accommodations youd like. one of my favs!

detailedReviews.author: Kimball Barlow
detailedReviews.text: Love it

detailedReviews.author: Allen Barlow
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is absolutely delicious and great service

detailedReviews.author: Francyne Snooks
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! The pizza is so fresh and the worker, Jean is the best. Great service, super friendly and the best garlic bread  I've ever had.

detailedReviews.author: Eglis
detailedReviews.text: Muchas gracias ah la atenci√≥n del se√±or Jean Carlos x brindarnos la traducci√≥n excelente ambiente de trabajo y muy buena la comida felicidades

detailedReviews.author: Joelis Hurtado
detailedReviews.text: Un excelente servicio muy buen ambiente de trabajo muy buena comida y muchas gracias ah la atenci√≥n del se√±or Jean Carlos felicidades

detailedReviews.author: Maryolith Quijada
detailedReviews.text:
I finally found a good place to eat super delicious pizza with great taste. I love it. And Jean Carlos's service was super attentive. I loved it.

al fin encontre un buen lugar para comer pizza super deliciosa y buen gusto las amo, y la atencion de jean carlos super atento me encanto

detailedReviews.author: Alexis Russell
detailedReviews.text:
We love their pizza!! Awesome wood fired pies
PS- they have homemade gelato!

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Dotson
detailedReviews.text: Pizza rocks! Ranch fantastic

detailedReviews.author: Francisco Ampuero
detailedReviews.text:
2/5 Stars
I was really looking forward to trying this place, but unfortunately, the pizza was pretty disappointing. The crust was okay, but the overall flavor just wasn‚Äôt there. The sauce tasted bland, and the cheese didn‚Äôt really stand out. It felt like it was missing seasoning or something to bring it all together. I wouldn‚Äôt say it was terrible, but definitely below average compared to other spots in the area. Probably won‚Äôt be coming back anytime soon.

detailedReviews.author: Arnica Christensen
detailedReviews.text: This place is amazing! Such a great variety of pizzas, salads and desserts. The food is delicious and the service is great. Very friendly. I will definitely be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: P A
detailedReviews.text: The pizza, especially the crust is amazing!!!

detailedReviews.author: Cameron Tribe
detailedReviews.text: In my opinion this is the best pizza you can get in Saratoga and Lehi. It comes out fresh from the wood fire oven and smells amazing. Then you take a bite and you‚Äôre shocked with all the flavors. The crust tastes amazing. You can tell they‚Äôve perfected their crust recipe. This place is soo good!

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Crittenden
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been around the world trying the best pizza including New Haven (my personal favorite style) and all around New York City and I must say, this place holds water compared to those areas. I would say best I‚Äôve had in Utah and I‚Äôve had almost everything in the state.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Kloth
detailedReviews.text: My new favorite pizza in Utah! I did some hvac service on the roof and kept smelling the pizza. Told myself that I had to take my family and try it out. Glad I did! Wood fired deliciousness. My only regret is that we didn‚Äôt try it sooner!

detailedReviews.author: Scott Webb
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely wonderful pizza and calzones.  Tons of topping choices and they are generous with the amounts too.  I love the atmosphere.  Wish they had more seats, but such a good pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Paige Young
detailedReviews.text: This place is delicious!!!! We have come here multiple times and they have never disappoint! Customer service is great and they have so many yummy pizza options. Would recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Young
detailedReviews.text: This place is amazing every time we go!!!

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca
detailedReviews.text:
Was rather disappointed.

I got a gluten free pizza and the crust was not great. It was not fully cooked and seemed like I was eating bird seed.

The toppings helped mask it slightly. I got the chicken, bacon, ranch pizza.

The regular pizza I am assuming is a lot better but they really need to improve on their gluten free crust!! Maybe their cauliflower one is better.

The gluten free pizza also takes so much longer (which I get) but maybe also inform customers of that. I had almost all 5-6 people after me get their pizza before mine even came out.

detailedReviews.author: Senia
detailedReviews.text: The Place isn‚Äôt the cheapest, nor the fastest out the door, but they use quality ingredients and create great flavor combinations that are worth the wait.

detailedReviews.author: Savanna Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: We came here on a recommendation from a friend and we were not disappointed! The food was spectacular and the service we received from Jean Carlos was fantastic! Would recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Colton Richins
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I think I‚Äôve ever had. Crust was amazing. Tons of combo options. Overall very satisfied! Gene was also such an amazing host. It was a really nice experience and we will definitely be back every time we are craving pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Richins
detailedReviews.text: This place was so good! Yummalicious! Jean was fantastic - so friendly and even gave us a sample of one of their desserts. Will definitely be back!!

detailedReviews.author: Gabriel Souza
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutamente a melhor pizza de utah! Saborosa e assada perfeitamente, com combina√ß√µes extraordin√°rias!

Absolutely the best pizza in Utah! Tasty and perfectly baked, with extraordinary combinations!

detailedReviews.author: Khalel Corona
detailedReviews.text: You never feel disgusting after eating this pizza. It tastes and feels authentic, with real ingredients, and quality flavor. I don't know of many places that are like this. When I find them, they usually are super expensive, but these guys are fairly priced. Come here and you won't regret it. And eat it while its fresh (no preservatives :)

detailedReviews.author: Jim Karolak
detailedReviews.text: The pies were delicious

detailedReviews.author: Matt S
detailedReviews.text: They cook pizza fast and taste great from oven!!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Ford
detailedReviews.text: Seriously my favorite pizza place. The staff is super respectful and kind and the pizza is NEXT LEVEL DELICIOUS! You have got to try the cryin Hawian with white sauce and a jalape√±o stuffed bread !!!

detailedReviews.author: Joanna S
detailedReviews.text: For all my vegan friends, they have vegan pizzas n things!

detailedReviews.author: Talon Chappell
detailedReviews.text:
Really good wood-fire oven pizza, you can even feel the heat of the ovens when you fill up your drink.

Just a little cramped so I may take it home or eat outside next time, but the food is totally worth it. I hope they add wings or some other sides in the future.

detailedReviews.author: Malia Hyde
detailedReviews.text: 10/10 recommend. Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had.

detailedReviews.author: Michelle K
detailedReviews.text: The best wood fired pizza I‚Äôve had in awhile! Fresh and high quality ingredients! We enjoyed the Hawaiian, Supreme, and pepperoni. And they were so friendly! Highly recommend!!!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the exceptional crust, describing it as "pillowy where it needs to be and chewy where it needs to be," which enhances the overall pizza experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The service is consistently praised as exceptional, with staff going out of their way to resolve issues and provide helpful recommendations. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant offers a great value, with customers feeding large groups at affordable prices, making it a perfect choice for families and gatherings. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and incorrect order handling - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews about food quality and service - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Emily Allen
positive.text: Great dough! Makes the pizza. Love the chicken Alfredo.

positive.author: Chris Jenkins
positive.text: Took my family here for lunch, pizza was fabulous, service & price was perfect . I fed 4 adults & 4 teenager s for 51.00 The place is AMAZING

neutral.author: J T
neutral.text: We‚Äôve been there a couple times and the pizza is great, but it feels like I‚Äôm in a college dorm that happens to have 2 nice pizza ovens in it. Atmosphere is EXREMELY cluttered and not enticing. Whenever we go to dine in, it‚Äôs crowded and the seating isn‚Äôt great. We are lucky if we find a spot to sit with our family. Last time there was an extra fold up table that my kids could move which isn‚Äôt fun for anyone who has kids. It‚Äôs also VERY hot inside during the summer due to the heat of the sun combined with the open pizza ovens. Again, pizza is great, but not a fun place to dine in. A nice re-design/remodel and extra AC would really make this place ‚ÄúThe Place‚Äù

neutral.text:
Was rather disappointed.

I got a gluten free pizza and the crust was not great. It was not fully cooked and seemed like I was eating bird seed.

The toppings helped mask it slightly. I got the chicken, bacon, ranch pizza.

The regular pizza I am assuming is a lot better but they really need to improve on their gluten free crust!! Maybe their cauliflower one is better.

The gluten free pizza also takes so much longer (which I get) but maybe also inform customers of that. I had almost all 5-6 people after me get their pizza before mine even came out.

negative.author: Katelyn Hemingway
negative.text: We came in really excited to try this place, but unfortunately it was a big disappointment. The pizza was a bit overpriced and took about 40 minutes to come out, even though it wasn‚Äôt busy. When it finally arrived, it was burnt and hard, looked unappetizing, and tasted like cardboard. Definitely not worth it. The only positive was that the employees were kind, but I won‚Äôt be coming back.

negative.author: Conner Mickelsen
negative.text: Would recommend thinking twice about catering with them.  They were an hour late to our wedding luncheon and this made it so we couldn‚Äôt do some of the activities as planned.  When we confronted them about it they said on the invoice it showed they were supposed to be there at 5:00 when we needed them there at 4:00.  Looked at the invoice and it showed 4:00.  They let us come in before hand and taste the pizza and showed us pictures of their setup.  The pizza was really good and the setup potential was promising.  Then at our venue the pizza was mid at best and really flimsy.  Then the setup was not what we were promised and looked really rushed.  Not impressed.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
